name: Senior Backend Java Developer//Remote
description:
Our team is looking for Senior Backend JAVA Developer to join our team building next-generation microservice-based enterprise applications. As a Back End Developer, you will be part of an agile team with Backend and Front End developers, Product Owners, and QA engineers. You will work with JAVA Spring Boot Framework, PostgreSQL, and GitLab.

Job responsibilities:

  • Builds enterprise web applications through the full technology stack including backend server-based development, front-end server and client-based development, database design and integration.
  • Writes high-quality software code that utilizes unit testing to ensure a high-degree of software craftsmanship

Requirements:

  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills
  • Expertise in Java 8+ APIs
  • Knowledge of common Spring frameworks: Security, REST, JPA, Cloud Contract, Cloud Stream
  • Understanding/experience in high loaded microservice and cloud applications architecture
  • Data / process modeling and database design skills (generic RDBMS, Elasticsearch)
  • Good verbal and written communications skills in English are required

We welcome:

  • Experience in development projects for Hospitality / Wellness / Retail industries
  • Netflix OSS stack, HashiCorp Vault
  • Docker
  • Experience in building secure, high load optimized applications

We Offer:

  • Possibility to work remotely (from home etc.)
  • International company, enthusiastic environment
  • Motivating remuneration package
  • Competitive annual bonus scheme
  • Wide possibilities for training and professional growth
